scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.build:client: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.start:server: cd server && npm install && npm start
scripts.deploy:all: npm run build:client && npm run install:browsers && npm run start:server
scripts.deploy:all:32gb: npm run build:client && npm run install:browsers && npm run start:server:32gb
